overview: A semantic, accessible, and responsive healthcare homepage featuring navigation, hero content, informational sections, CTAs, and a footer. It includes accessibility hooks, test IDs, and a theme toggle for user interaction.
key_components: Navbar with brand and navigation links
Hero section with heading, description, and SVG illustration
Introduction section with three feature cards
CTA section with service and contact links
Footer with quick links and contact info
interactions: Clicking navigation links routes to other pages
Theme toggle button switches dark/light mode
Back-to-top button scrolls to top when visible
CTA buttons navigate to services or contact pages
data_flow: Static HTML content rendered from index.html
Theme toggle state likely persisted via main.js
CTA and nav links trigger client-side or full-page navigation
Toast container receives dynamic messages from main.js
accessibility: ARIA roles and labels on navigation, hero image, and footer
analytics: Potential click tracking on CTA and nav links
Scroll or visibility tracking for back-to-top button
test_ideas: Validate theme-toggle toggles aria-pressed and updates theme
Ensure nav links navigate correctly and highlight active page
Check CTA buttons route to correct pages
Confirm back-to-top button appears after scroll and functions
Validate all sections render with correct headings and content
Test toast container announces messages via aria-live
Run accessibility audit for WCAG compliance
